readable.title: 3553056438_4e611a7a2a
readable.content: A little boy kisses a little girl as they sit on a hay bale with pumpkins and a Halloween display in the background . A little boy kisses a little girl while sitting on hay bales surrounded by Halloween decorations . A little boy kissing a girl on a stack of hay . Two children are sitting on bales of hay in a Halloween themed setting . Two children are sitting on hay in front of pumpkins and play witches .
